song.englishname: A Glass To Count All The Hours

english.segment1: Sleep until night. The slowness of ancient sights. Ponder the voice of birds in song. Light enters by the glowing of fireflies. You said Is this forever ours?
english.segment2: Here is the light. That comes in brilliant forces. Reminding us of what was lost. Older than time, the rush of ending ages. Stories of ours. A glass to count all the hours
english.segment3: A rustle of leaves. Peaked your curiosity. I thought you might be vanishing. Tricked by a worm. Bewitched while imagining. The ghost of the earth took you from me
